title: Roger Bennett: "Reborn in the USA"
description: Michael sits down with culture and soccer commentator Roger Bennett, author of "Reborn in the USA: An Englishman's Love Letter to His Chosen Home." Original air date 25 August 2021. The book was published on 29 June 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Roger Bennett, Michael Smerconish)
